rows.label: tlk400401_msg0001
rows.name:
Umon is lucky to have Tora and
friends helping build the ship, mo!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0002
rows.name:
I need you to gather Puzzletree
Wood, mo. I'll process this
to make the rudder, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0003
rows.name:
You can gather Puzzletree Wood in Gula,
so it should be easy to find, mo. I
recommend the area around Torigo, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0004
rows.name:
One more thing, I need you
to gather Diamond Oak, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0005
rows.name:
I'll use this to reinforce the ship's
bow, mo. It's quite rare, so it's
hard to get your hands on, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0006
rows.name:
In Gula, you can only find it in a
place called Dawnview Grotto, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0007
rows.name: And also...

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0008
rows.name:
If I ask for everything at once
you might forget, so please
gather those two first, mo!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0009
rows.name: Momo! You really gathered it all, mo?

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0010
rows.name:
Puzzletree Wood and Diamond
Oak... This is magnificent, mo!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0011
rows.name:
With this, the ship's hull
will be complete, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0012
rows.name:
But don't celebrate just yet...
Please don't get mad, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0013
rows.name:
We have the materials for the
hull, but the Divine Beast that
was just here ran away, mo...

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0014
rows.name:
They run away if you forget to
feed them even just a little, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0015
rows.name: So I need you to go catch it, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0016
rows.name:
It was heading toward Masrah
Spring in Gula. It's probably
relaxing around there, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0017
rows.name:
After you find the Divine
Beast, feed it these Green
Pollen Orbs I'm giving you, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0018
rows.name:
That'll seal the contract. As long
as you give it Green Pollen Orbs,
it will gladly be your ship, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0019
rows.name:
Of course, if you run out of Pollen
Orbs, the deal is off, mo...

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0020
rows.name:
This is a gentle, traditional
Nopon taming method, not
forceful like in Superbia, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0021
rows.name:
Heheh! I just let a secret
trade skill slip, mo!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0022
rows.name: A-anyway, go to Masrah Spring, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0023
rows.name:
Of course, it won't be there
unless the Cloud Sea is
high, so be careful, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0024
rows.name:
Go to Masrah Spring and
tame the Divine Beast, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0025
rows.name:
By the way, be careful,
because it won't appear when
the Cloud Sea is low, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0026
rows.name:
...Wondering how to raise
the Cloud Sea, mo?

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0027
rows.name:
If you stay at an inn and
rest overnight, the Cloud
Sea level should change, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0028
rows.name:
Wonderful, mo! You've
returned safely, mo!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0029
rows.name:
I've fed it lots of Green Pollen Orbs,
and as you can see the hull is attached,
so you can depart anytime, mo!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0030
rows.name: No thanks are necessary, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0031
rows.name:
When you're ready to depart,
just let Umon know, mo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0032
rows.name:
This cutting-edge masterpiece of
a ship is already finished, mo!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0033
rows.name: Alright, you can depart anytime, mo!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0034
rows.name: Set sail for the World Tree?

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0035
rows.name: Set sail

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0036
rows.name: Not yet

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0037
rows.name:
Have a safe trip, mo!
Take care, Tora, mo!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0038
rows.name:
No need to rush. Take your time
preparing, mo. This ship will
wait for you forever, mo.
